Articles.Content:
Hi all, I am playing around at the moment and would like some help on where to find information in the https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/index.html site that might help me figure out out to make a windows form button launch a vessel ?

So far I have a form, an a button, and have linked references to UnityEngine.dll, UnityEngine.UI.dll, Assembly-Csharp.dll, Assembly-Csharp-firstpass.dll but dont know where to go to look next. 

Any help appreciated. Its a long weekend and im just trying to learn some new things.

Ksp mods are class libraries, you can't use forms like if you were building a pure .Net application. If you want a ui example, check out the FirstKerbaliser class of Earn Your Stripes (in my signature)
That's a shame  will check out your work
